entries.title: New Meta AI demo writes racist and inaccurate scientific literature, gets pulled
entries.description: Galactica language model generated convincing text about fact and nonsense alike.

entries.title: Elizabeth Holmes sentenced to 11.25 years in prison for Theranos fraud
ID.me lied to IRS about unemployment fraud, average wait times, House Dems say
entries.description: ID.me said $414 billion was lost—10 times higher than feds' estimate.

entries.title: Researchers build a working camera out of atomically thin semiconductors
entries.description: Sheet of atoms works similarly to silicon but has some unique properties.

entries.title: Nvidia releases RTX 4090 and 4080 firmware update to fix display output bug
entries.description: Update can be installed on both Founders Edition and third-party GeForce GPUs.

entries.title: Musk emails remaining Twitter staff to find “anyone who actually writes software”
entries.description: Musk email: "Anyone who actually writes software, please report to the 10th floor."

entries.title: Sony’s Miles Morales was at least as good as Spider-Man, and now it’s on PC, too
entries.description: Graphical enhancements and a focus on varied input methods headline the port.

entries.title: FCC unveils big update to broadband map—and wants you to help correct errors
entries.description: Map is better but not perfect—look up your address to see if there are mistakes.

entries.title: There’s a “new” Atari arcade game, and I can’t put it down
entries.description: Atari 50's "Vctr Sctr" is an addictive love letter to a long-lost arcade era.

entries.title: The 2023 Hyundai Ioniq 6’s interior lighting might cheer you up
entries.description: Hyundai's UX team studied the effect lighting color combinations have on mood.

entries.title: We now have a pretty good idea what the “Connecticut vampire” looked like
entries.description: Targeted whole genome analysis strengthens case that he was a man named John Barber.

entries.title: Twitter mayhem, staff cuts have advertisers bailing on the platform
entries.description: Twitter advertisers pausing ads over brand safety, cybersecurity concerns.

entries.title: Twitter in chaos as employees accept Musk’s invitation to quit their jobs
entries.description: Musk jokes through crisis, says record numbers "logging in to see if Twitter is dead."

entries.title: Eli Lilly CEO says insulin tweet flap “probably” signals need to bring down cost
entries.description: "We’re obviously not the only insulin company. But the tropes go on," he said.

entries.title: Twitter’s moderation system is in tatters
entries.description: After Elon Musk’s staff cuts, there are hardly any moderators left to talk to.

entries.title: 10 years later, the Wii U is still deeply weird—and we love it
entries.description: Oddly named console made up for its mistakes with infinite quirky charm.
